document.full_text: champion rafa nadal played three decent sets and novak djokovic none at all as the leading duo progressed in the french open on monday and injury-hit andy murray battled to stay in the tournament.
document.title: nadal battles through as djokovic gets free pass
lines_and_colors: champion rafa nadal played three decent sets and novak djokovic none at all as the leading duo progressed in the french open on monday and injury-hit andy murray battled to stay in the tournament.
